statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP' OR segment_name = 'Premium';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 AND first_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM customers_demographic WHERE age <= 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customers_behavioral WHERE visits < 5 OR purchases < 1;
DELETE FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP' OR segment_name = 'Premium';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE region = 'West Coast' AND income < 50000;
DELETE FROM behaviors WHERE LENGTH(purchase_history) < 5 AND JSON_EXTRACT(website_activity, '$.last_login') < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE amount < 100.00 AND date < '2022-01-01';
